element.name: mxfmux
element.description: Muxes video/audio streams into a MXF stream
element.author: Sebastian Dröge <sebastian.droege@collabora.co.uk>

caps.name: bwf_audio_sink_%u
caps.details: audio/x-raw-int, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], endianness=(int){ 1234, 4321 }, width=(int)32, depth=(int)32, signed=(boolean)true; audio/x-raw-int, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], endianness=(int){ 1234, 4321 }, width=(int)24, depth=(int)24, signed=(boolean)true; audio/x-raw-int, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], endianness=(int){ 1234, 4321 }, width=(int)16, depth=(int)16, signed=(boolean)true; audio/x-raw-int, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], endianness=(int){ 1234, 4321 }, width=(int)8, depth=(int)8, signed=(boolean)false
